path.description: The path to the GeoPackage source

minZoom.description: The minimum zoom level for the raster source

maxZoom.description: The maximum zoom level for the raster source

tables.description: The names of the tables in the GeoPackage to use as a source (optional). If left empty, all tables will be used.

attribution.description: The attribution for the GeoPackage source

interpolate.description: Interpolate between grid cells when overzooming?
